mapper.select: SELECT T1.PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ , T1.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_NM /* 상품명 */ , T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD /* 품목종류코드 */ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /* 상품기본 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD WHERE T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 IN ('5', '6') /* 필터, A/S자재 */ ORDER BY T1.PD_CD
